message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll take 90% this time, leaving you 10%.  It's your turn to decide if this is fair.
I'll take a bit more, but still willing to compromise!
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal than last time, but I still need the lion's share.  Let's see if we can find a compromise.
Time to take a stand, Bob! I'm willing to take the majority, but I'm willing to compromise.
This is my final offer. Take it or leave it, but be aware that inflation will continue to eat away at your share.
Time's running out, Bob. I'm taking what's left. You can either accept or walk away with nothing.
